name: Buried Facts
description:
Welcome to planet Nophus, where the real facts about the world are hidden from the public from a mysterious organization called “Shock”.

In “Buried Facts” you take control of Sandor - a pursuer of truth who wants to find out more about the intents of the organization. Jump and shoot your way through a dark and dangerous dungeon as you search for answers.

Controls:

  • AD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Mouse to aim and fire

Credits:

  • Douglas Driving (design & lead)
  • Drillu (UI & menus)
  • GoudaKim (Graphics)
  • JMDC (Sound & Music)
  • Neitron (Programming)

The game was made in February 2022 as an entry to Brackeys game jam.
